fields.name: MessageTtl
fields.description: The period of time for which a message is available to sync before it is expired. Specify the duration using the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601.

fields.name: Schedule
fields.description: The cron expression indicating the schedule that the connected registry will sync with its parent.

fields.name: SyncWindow
fields.description: The time window during which sync is enabled for each schedule occurrence. Specify the duration using the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601.
